scripts.release: npm run clean --workspace packages/udoc-viewer && npm run build --workspace packages/udoc-viewer && sh -c 'npm version "$0" --workspace packages/udoc-viewer --no-git-tag-version && VERSION=$(node -p "require(\"./packages/udoc-viewer/package.json\").version") && git add packages/udoc-viewer/package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "v${VERSION}" && git tag "v${VERSION}" && git push && git push --tags'
